ComicInfo.Notes: Tagged with comicbox 1.1.1 on 2024-03-13T17:23:44 [Issue ID 4000-140348] urn:comicvine:4000-140348 Tagged with ComicTagger 1.6.0a13.dev122 using info from Grand Comics Database on 2024-06-17 17:45:38. [Issue ID 369720]
ComicInfo.Summary: Lights. Camera. Action! The cameras are rolling for the auditions of a new made-for-TV superhero team: WildGuard. Hundreds of superheroes will try out, but only five will have what it takes to make the team. if they survive! Join a host of heroes, through the agony of competition and unforeseen dangers, as they hope to be selected by a panel of judges, including the mysterious Producer "X". Who will make the cut? You make the call! Log on to www.wildguard.com and cast your vote for the hero you want to make the team. Written and drawn by Todd Nauck, the artist of popular DC Comics series, Young Justice. There are twenty finalists left! After last issue's battle royale, the auditions have not gone as planned, but the show must go on! What happened to the other WildGuard contenders? It's up to producer X and the remaining twenty to bring them back alive as the auditions continue.
ComicInfo.Title: Part Three: Rescue: En Route
